body: If tracing hooks on http.Server are created then yes but might be overkill as to me, just calling the Logger with an English error message on errors is not a great design for a standard library as it leaves no options for translations or any deep dive into the net.Conn that errored out and simply adding a "real" handler that takes arguments like the Err code and the net.Conn so as not to break compatibility is all that is needed to fix this.
